author: CrunchBangDev
install_msg:
You've just installed the Bio cog!
Use `[p]bio` to see your bio.
Add information to your bio with `[p]bio [field] [value]`
Use `[p]bio @[user]` to see someone else's bio
Use `[p]biofields` to list available fields
Use `[p]biofields add [field]` and `[p]biofields remove [field]` to add and remove fields
User `[p]biosearch [field]` to search all users for a field
Use `[p]bioreset` to reset your bio
name: Bio
description: Add information to your player bio and lookup information others have shared.
